Install Open CV
In the Ubuntu 16.04 64bit Required dependencies are the followings 
1.Git 
2.Python 2.6 or later and Numpy 1.5 or later with developer packages (python-dev, python-numpy) 
3.CMake 2.6 or higher 
4.GCC 4.4.x or later
